Please proceed with my savings account. <|endofcontext|><|belief|> banks account_type savings <|endofbelief|> <|action|> banks offer account_type, banks offer account_balance <|endofaction|> <|response|> There is [banks_account_balance] in your [banks_account_type] account. <|endofresponse|>
<|context|> <|user|> Will you find a therapist? <|system|> Which city? Psychiatrist or Family Counselor or others? <|user|> Psychologist in Oakland. <|system|> I found 10 therapists. Alameda Children's Specialized in Oakland is a Psychologist. <|user|> Their address and number? <|system|> 7200 Bancroft Ave # 125C. Reach them at 510-383-5100. <|user|> Anyone else? <|system|> Brown Timothy A. in Oakland is a Psychologist. <|user|> Great. Will you schedule an appointment for 6th of this month at 5:15 pm? <|endofcontext|><|belief|> services appointment_date 6th of this month, services appointment_time 5:15 pm, services city Oakland, services therapist_name Brown Timothy A, services type Psychologist <|endofbelief|> <|action|> services confirm therapist_name, services confirm appointment_time, services confirm appointment_date <|endofaction|> <|response|> Please confirm an appointment with [services_therapist_name] on March 6th [services_appointment_date]ces_appointment_time]. <|endofresponse|>
<|context|> <|user|> Can you please find me a therapist? I'm looking for some help. <|system|> Okay. What city do you want me to look in? Were you wanting a Psychiatrist, or a Family Counselor, or something else? <|user|> I'd like a Psychologist, actually, in San Jose. <|system|> Okay, I've located 10 different therapists that might work for you. Here's one you might like, Barskyex Bryna G. They are a Psychologist in San Jose. <|user|> Can you give me the address there? <|endofcontext|><|belief|> services city San Jose, services type Psychologist <|endofbelief|> <|action|> services inform address <|endofaction|> <|response|> Sure, it's [services_address]. <|endofresponse|>
